entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Oxbow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:28 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Airport 8:15 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: E 50 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing this evening and ending before morning then cloudy. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 8:03 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:03 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 8:03 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
